2025760.name: Android Simulator: Prologue
2025760.description:
Android Simulator: Prologue is just part of the gameplay that awaits you in the full game. Your job in the Prologue will be to fulfill the main mission with as few losses as possible. Apart from the main thread, each gameplay will feature random events, making every new game take on a different course. Android Simulator: Prologue is futuristic FPS game in which you take the role of an android who is in charge of a spaceship colony.

The most important is that prologue allows you to get into the world of Android Simulator so you will be fully ready before the final product release!

Power supply




Take good care of the energy level on your ship colony. Keep an eye on power demand. Your ship will consume energy depending on the propulsion force, the power of active shields, oxygen generators, and other parameters.
If there's trouble, you have to react by shutting off the appropriate ship modules.

Colonizers




The ship in your care is filled with 36 cryogenic capsules. Each capsule contains outstanding scientists and selected breeders who are in hibernation. It is your job to do health checkups of your patients and to keep a lid on the technical condition of the capsules.

Botanic garden




The colony ship is self-contained. Oxygen and additional food are supplied by plants, and it is your responsibility to provide suitable climatic conditions for plant growth. Control parameters such as air humidity, temperature, and hydration level.

Navigation




Control and manipulate the flight route depending on changing conditions. During the game you will come up against random events such as damage caused by a meteor shower, escaping planetary gravity, system failures or exploring abandoned asteroids.

Medicine




Hibernating colonizers may suffer from ailments related to their long flight in space. Some will become patients and may require your medical attention. Manage laboratory tests and decide on the method of treatment.

Mechanics




It is also your job to care of the technical condition of your spaceship. You have to patch up damaged components and make dynamic decisions about technical difficulties.

Android Simulator: Prologue is a part of the full version of Android Simulator and is completely free.
2025760.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 日语, 韩语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 土耳其语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
